title: Clothier
summaries: The Clothier is an NPC vendor who sells mainly vanity items. He will move in once the following criteria have been met:

• There is an available vacant house.
  • Skeletron has been defeated.

He is the same character as the Old Man who guards the Dungeon before Skeletron is defeated. After defeating Skeletron, the Old Man is freed from his curse, and he disappears from the Dungeon's entrance. His clothes are no longer tattered, his eyes have turned blue (from red), and he is wearing a Red Hat. Equipping the Clothier Voodoo Doll allows the player to attack and kill the Clothier (similar to the Guide Voodoo Doll) with any damage-inflicting item. Doing so at night re-summons Skeletron, but killing the Clothier without the Clothier Voodoo Doll equipped (such as using Flymeal(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) on its own) will not summon the boss.

On the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked>, the Clothier fires shadowflame skull projectiles to defend himself from enemies. They inflict enemies with the <linked>Shadowflame</linked> <linked>debuff</linked> for 5â€“10 seconds and deal 16 / <linked>24</linked> / <linked>28</linked> damage at the start of the game, but as the player progresses, the Clothier will gain <linked>various stat increases</linked>.
